articles.description: Meanwhile, an FTC decision can reportedly be expected by January.
articles.content:
• Microsoft is currently working to acquire Activision Blizzard for almost $69 billion. 
  • The deal is undergoing regulatory review, and has seen PlayStation parent company Sony push for … [+2254 chars]
